trans-unit.source: Embedded Expressions in XML (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: XML (Visual Basic) 中內嵌運算式 |Microsoft 文件
XML 中內嵌的運算式 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Embedded expressions enable you to create XML literals that contain expressions that are evaluated at run time.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的運算式可讓您建立 XML 常值包含在執行階段評估的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The syntax for an embedded expression is `<%=` `expression` `%>`, which is the same as the syntax used in [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](../../../../csharp/language-reference/preprocessor-directives/includes/vstecasp_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 內嵌運算式的語法是`<%=` `expression` `%>`，這會是相同的語法中使用[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](../../../../csharp/language-reference/preprocessor-directives/includes/vstecasp_md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create an XML element literal, combining embedded expressions with literal text content.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以建立的 XML 項目常值，結合使用常值文字內容有內嵌的運算式。
[!code-vb[VbXMLSamples #&27;](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/codesnippet/VisualBasic/embedded-expressions-in-xml_1.vb)]

trans-unit.source: If `isbnNumber` contains the integer 12345 and `modifiedDate` contains the date 3/5/2006, when this code executes, the value of `book` is:
trans-unit.target: 如果`isbnNumber`包含整數 12345 和`modifiedDate`包含的日期 3/5/2006，此程式碼執行時，值`book`是︰
內嵌的運算式的位置和驗證

trans-unit.source: Embedded expressions can appear only at certain locations within XML literal expressions.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的運算式只可以出現在 XML 常值運算式內的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: The expression location controls which types the expression can return and how `Nothing` is handled.
trans-unit.target: 可以傳回型別運算式的運算式位置控制項，以及如何`Nothing`處理。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the allowed locations and types of embedded expressions.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述允許的位置和內嵌運算式的型別。
常值中的位置
運算式的型別
處理`Nothing`
XML 項目名稱
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName></xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>
錯誤
XML 項目內容
`Object`或陣列`Object`
略過
XML 項目屬性名稱
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName></xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>

trans-unit.source: Error, unless the attribute value is also `Nothing`
trans-unit.target: 錯誤，除非也是屬性值`Nothing`
XML 項目屬性值
略過屬性宣告
XML 項目屬性
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>或集合<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute></xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute></xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute>
略過
XML 文件根項目

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> or a collection of one <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> object and an arbitrary number of <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XProcessingInstruction> and <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XComment> objects
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>一個<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>物件和任意數目的<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XProcessingInstruction>和<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XComment>物件</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XComment></xref:System.Xml.Linq.XProcessingInstruction></xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>的集合，或</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>
略過

trans-unit.source: If you enable `Option Strict`, the compiler checks that the type of each embedded expression widens to the required type.
trans-unit.target: 如果您啟用`Option Strict`，編譯器會檢查每個內嵌的運算式的型別擴展的必要型別。

trans-unit.source: The only exception is for the root element of an XML document, which is verified when the code runs.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的例外狀況是在程式碼執行時，系統驗證的 XML 文件的根項目。

trans-unit.source: If you compile without `Option Strict`, you can embed expressions of type `Object` and their type is verified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 如果您編譯而不需`Option Strict`，您可以將內嵌運算式的型別`Object`和執行階段就會驗證它們的型別。

trans-unit.source: In locations where content is optional, embedded expressions that contain `Nothing` are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的內容的位置內嵌運算式，包含`Nothing`會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This means you do not have to check that element content, attribute values, and array elements are not `Nothing` before you use an XML literal.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您不需要檢查的項目內容，屬性值，而且陣列項目不`Nothing`使用 XML 常值之前。

trans-unit.source: Required values, such as element and attribute names, cannot be `Nothing`.
trans-unit.target: 必要值，例如項目和屬性名稱不能`Nothing`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using an embedded expression in a particular type of literal, see [XML Document Literal](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-document-literal.md), [XML Element Literal](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-element-literal.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需特定類型的常值中使用內嵌的運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 文件常值](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-document-literal.md)， [XML 項目常值](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-element-literal.md)。
範圍規則

trans-unit.source: The compiler converts each XML literal into a constructor call for the appropriate literal type.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會將每個 XML 常值轉換成適當的常值類型的建構函式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The literal content and embedded expressions in an XML literal are passed as arguments to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式，會將常值的內容和內嵌的運算式，在 XML 常值中傳遞做為引數。

trans-unit.source: This means that all [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] programming elements available to an XML literal are also available to its embedded expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這表示所有[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]用於 XML 常值的程式設計項目也是用於內嵌的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Within an XML literal, you can access the XML namespace prefixes declared with the `Imports` statement.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML 常值，您可存取的 XML 命名空間前置詞宣告`Imports`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: You can declare a new XML namespace prefix, or shadow an existing XML namespace prefix, in an element by using the `xmlns` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 您可以宣告新的 XML 命名空間前置詞，或遮蔽現有 XML 命名空間前置詞，在項目中使用`xmlns`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The new namespace is available to the child nodes of that element, but not to XML literals in embedded expressions.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的運算式中的 XML 常值的子節點，該項目的但不是使用新的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: When you declare an XML namespace prefix by using the `xmlns` namespace attribute, the attribute value must be a constant string.
trans-unit.target: 當您宣告 XML 命名空間前置詞使用`xmlns`命名空間屬性的屬性值必須是常數字串。

trans-unit.source: In this regard, using the `xmlns` attribute is like using the `Imports` statement to declare an XML namespace.
trans-unit.target: 在這方面，使用`xmlns`屬性，就像是`Imports`陳述式來宣告 XML 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use an embedded expression to specify the XML namespace value.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用內嵌的運算式來指定 XML 命名空間值。
